00069 unsigned char radio_rx_data_counter = 0;
00071 unsigned int counter_compare0 = 0;
00073 unsigned int counter_sync = 32000;
00075 unsigned char counter_poll_buttons = 0;
00077 unsigned char counter_poll_ext_devices = 0;
00079 unsigned int counter_screensaver_timeout = 0;
00081 unsigned int counter_ping_interval = 0;
00083 unsigned int counter_ms = 0;
00085 unsigned char counter_poll_rotary_encoder = 0;
00087 unsigned int counter_poll_radio = 0;
00089 unsigned int counter_last_pulse_event=0;

00092 unsigned int counter_event_timer = 0;

00107 void clear_screensaver_timer(void) {
00108         counter_screensaver_timeout = 0;
00109 }
00110 
00115 void event_add_message(void (*func), unsigned int offset, unsigned char id) {
00116         EVENT_MESSAGE event;
00117         
00118         if (event_in_queue() == 0)
00119                 counter_event_timer = 0;
00120 
00121         event.func = func;
00122         event.time_target = counter_event_timer + offset;
00123         event.id = id;
00124         
00125         event_queue_add(event);
00126 }

00131 unsigned char ext_key_get_assignment(unsigned char index) {
00132         return(settings.ext_key_assignments[index]);
00133 }
00134 
00138 void ext_key_set_assignment(unsigned char index, unsigned char func) {
00139         settings.ext_key_assignments[index] = func;
00140 }
00141 
00143 void event_run(void) {
00144         if (event_in_queue()) {
00145                 EVENT_MESSAGE event = event_queue_get();
00146                 
00147                 //Run the function in the event queue
00148                 event.func();
00149         
00150                 //When the function has been run we drop the message
00151                 event_queue_drop();
00152         }
00153 }
00154 
00156 void main_update_display(void) {
00157         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY);
00158 }
00159 
00161 void shutdown_device(void) {
00162         led_set_error(LED_STATE_ON);
00163         
00164         internal_comm_add_tx_message(INT_COMM_PULL_THE_PLUG,0,0);
00165 }
00166 
00168 void set_tx_ant_leds(void) {
00169         for (unsigned char i=0;i<4;i++)
00170                 if (status.selected_ant & (1<<i))
00171                         led_set_tx_ant(i+1,LED_STATE_ON);
00172         else
00173                 led_set_tx_ant(i+1,LED_STATE_OFF);
00174 }
00175 
00178 void set_knob_function(unsigned char function) {
00179         if (function == KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO) {
00180                 //The auto selects the knob function we feel is most useful
00181                 if (runtime_settings.band_change_mode == BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL)
00182                         status.knob_function = KNOB_FUNCTION_SELECT_BAND;
00183                 else
00184                         status.knob_function = KNOB_FUNCTION_NONE;
00185         } 
00186         else
00187                 status.knob_function = function;
00188 }
00189 
00191 void main_save_settings(void) {
00192         eeprom_save_runtime_settings(&runtime_settings);
00193 }
00194 
00196 void load_settings(void) {
00197                 /* Read the EEPROM table */
00198         eeprom_read_table();
00199         
00200         //Load the radio settings from the eeprom
00201         radio_interface_load_eeprom();
00202         
00203         //Load the antenna RX data from the eeprom
00204         antenna_ctrl_rx_ant_read_eeprom();
00205 
00206         //Load the runtime settings from the EEPROM
00207         eeprom_get_runtime_settings(&runtime_settings);
00208         
00209         settings.network_device_is_master = 0;
00210         
00211         //Load the settings struct
00212         eeprom_get_settings_structure(&settings);
00213         
00214         //Load all the sequencer settings
00215         sequencer_load_eeprom();
00216 }
00217 
00222 void main_update_ptt_status(void) {
00223         unsigned char state = 0;
00224         
00225         //Check that there is an antenna on the current band
00226         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(0) & (1<<ANTENNA_EXIST_FLAG))
00227                 state = 0;
00228         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(1) & (1<<ANTENNA_EXIST_FLAG))
00229                 state = 0;
00230         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(2) & (1<<ANTENNA_EXIST_FLAG))
00231                 state = 0;
00232         if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(3) & (1<<ANTENNA_EXIST_FLAG))
00233                 state = 0;
00234         
00235         //Check that an antenna is selected
00236         if (status.selected_ant != 0)
00237                 state = 0;
00238         else
00239                 state = 1;
00240         
00241         //Check that a band is selected
00242         if (status.selected_band == BAND_UNDEFINED)
00243                 state = 1;
00244         
00245         if (radio_get_ptt_status() != 0)
00246                 state = 2;
00247         
00248         //Comment this part for testing outside the bus
00249         //if (event_get_errors() != 0)
00250         //      state = 1;
00251         
00252 //      printf("UPDATE PTT, state = %i\n",state);
00253         
00254         if (state == 0) {
00255                 main_set_inhibit_state(INHIBIT_OK_TO_SEND);
00256                 led_set_ptt(LED_STATE_PTT_OK);
00257         }
00258         else if (state == 1) {
00259                 main_set_inhibit_state(INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND);
00260                 led_set_ptt(LED_STATE_PTT_INHIBIT);
00261         }
00262         else if (state == 2) {
00263                 main_set_inhibit_state(INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX);
00264                 led_set_ptt(LED_STATE_PTT_ACTIVE);
00265         }
00266 }
00267 
00272 void main_set_inhibit_state(enum enum_inhibit_state state) {
00273         runtime_settings.inhibit_state = state;
00274 }
00275 
00280 enum enum_inhibit_state main_get_inhibit_state(void) {
00281         return(runtime_settings.inhibit_state);
00282 }
00283 
00285 void send_ping(void) {
00286         //Set which is the current selected band
00287         ping_message[2] = status.selected_band;
00288                                 
00289         bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR, 0, BUS_CMD_PING, 3, ping_message);
00290 }
00291 
00293 int main(void){
00294         cli();
00295         
00296         MCUSR = 0;
00297         wdt_disable();
00298         
00299         delay_ms(250);
00300         
00301         /* Initialize various hardware resources */
00302         init_ports();
00303         
00304         delay_ms(250);
00305         
00306         //Initialize the 128x64 display
00307         glcd_init();
00308         glcd_clear();
00309         
00310         i2c_init();
00311 
00312         //Check if the computer interface should have full control of the box, setup mode
00313         if (PIND & (1<<5)) {
00314                 computer_interface_deactivate_setup();
00315         }
00316         else {
00317                 PORTC |= (1<<7);
00318                 computer_interface_activate_setup();
00319         }
00320 
00321         
00322         //Check if this is the first time we start the device, if so we need to initiate some
00323         //data structures. To force this at startup just change the value that should be read and
00324         //written to the EEPROM
00325         if (eeprom_read_startup_byte() != 0x01) {
00326                 eeprom_create_table();
00327                 
00328                 eeprom_read_table();
00329                 
00330                 //write the default runtime settings
00331                 runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value = 20;
00332                 runtime_settings.amplifier_ptt_output = 1;
00333                 runtime_settings.radio_ptt_output = 1;
00334                 runtime_settings.inhibit_state = 0;
00335                 runtime_settings.band_change_mode = BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL;
00336                 
00337                 //Write the settings to the EEPROM
00338                 eeprom_save_runtime_settings(&runtime_settings);
00339                 
00340                 eeprom_write_startup_byte(0x01);
00341 
00342                 //The first time the box is started, we need to setup the settings
00343                 computer_interface_activate_setup();
00344         }
00345         
00346         //Init the status structure
00347         status.buttons_last_state = 0;
00348         status.buttons_current_state = 0;
00349         status.ext_devices_current_state = ih_poll_ext_devices();
00350         status.ext_devices_last_state = status.ext_devices_current_state;
00351         status.selected_rx_antenna = 0;
00352         status.new_band = BAND_UNDEFINED;
00353         status.current_band_portion = BAND_LOW;
00354         status.new_band_portion = BAND_LOW;
00355         status.sub_menu_antenna_index = 0;
00356         status.rotator_step_resolution = 5;
00357                 
00358         //Load all settings from the EEPROM     
00359         load_settings();
00360         
00361         //Init the communzication routines between the computer and the openASC box
00362         computer_interface_init();
00363         
00364         //Init the backlight PWM
00365         init_backlight();
00366         
00367         runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value = 20;
00368         
00369         display_set_backlight(runtime_settings.lcd_backlight_value);
00370                 
00371         //Check to see if the radio interface is configured as manual or automatic as default
00372         if (radio_interface_get_interface() == RADIO_INTERFACE_MANUAL)
00373                 runtime_settings.band_change_mode = BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL;
00374         else
00375                 runtime_settings.band_change_mode = BAND_CHANGE_MODE_AUTO;
00376 
00377         //Init the communication between the uCs
00378         init_usart();
00379 
00380         //Init the communication between the motherboard uC and the front panel uC
00381         //The first argument will be called each time a message should be parsed
00382         //The second argument will be called each time a character should be sent
00383         internal_comm_init((void *)event_internal_comm_parse_message, (void *)usart0_transmit);
00384                          
00385         if (!computer_interface_is_active()) {
00386                 //Initialize the radio interface
00387                 //radio_interface_init();
00388                 init_usart_computer();
00389         }
00390         else {
00391                 //Init the computer communication
00392                 init_usart_computer();
00393                 
00394                 sei();
00395                 
00396                 display_setup_view();
00397                 
00398                 while(1) {
00399                         computer_interface_send_data();
00400                         
00401                         computer_interface_parse_data();
00402                         
00403                         //Poll the RX queue in the internal comm to see if we have any new messages to be PARSED
00404                         internal_comm_poll_rx_queue();
00405                 
00406                         //Poll the TX queue in the internal comm to see if we have any new messages to be SE
00407                         internal_comm_poll_tx_queue();
00408                 }
00409         }
00410         
00411         band_ctrl_load_band_limits();
00412 
00413         //Init the realtime clock
00414         ds1307_init();
00415                         
00416         /* This delay is simply so that if you have the devices connected to the same power supply
00417         all units should not send their status messages at the same time. Therefor we insert a delay
00418         that is based on the external address of the device */  
00419         delay_ms(7 * settings.network_address);
00420         
00421         device_count = settings.network_device_count;
00422         
00423         //This must be done in this order for it to work properly!
00424         /* Read the external address of the device */
00425         bus_set_address(settings.network_address);
00426         
00427         
00428         bus_init();
00429 
00430         //Init the power meter
00431         powermeter_init(settings.powermeter_address, settings.powermeter_update_rate_text, settings.powermeter_update_rate_bargraph, settings.powermeter_vswr_limit);
00432         
00433         if (settings.network_device_is_master == 1) {
00434                 bus_set_is_master(1,settings.network_device_count);
00435         }
00436         else {
00437                 bus_set_is_master(0,0); 
00438         }
00439         
00440         if (bus_is_master()) {
00441                 tx_queue_dropall();
00442         }
00443         
00444         init_timer_0();
00445         
00446         //Timer used for the communication bus. The interrupt is caught in bus.c
00447         init_timer_2();
00448 
00449         //Print the startup picture
00450         glcd_print_picture();
00451         
00452         //Set all leds on at startup so it's possible to see everything works
00453         led_set_all(LED_STATE_ON);
00454         delay_ms(250);
00455         led_set_all(LED_STATE_OFF);
00456         
00457         //Initialize the menu system
00458         menu_init();
00459         
00460         main_set_inhibit_state(INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND);
00461         led_set_ptt(LED_STATE_PTT_INHIBIT);
00462         
00463         set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00464         
00465         //init_usart_computer();
00466 
00467         sei();
00468         
00469         //TEMPORARY
00470         DDRB |= (1<<1);
00471         
00472         ping_message[0] = DEVICE_ID_MAINBOX;
00473         ping_message[1] = 0x00;//settings.ptt_interlock_input;
00474         
00475         device_started = 1;
00476         
00477         while(1) {
00478                 if (!rx_queue_is_empty())
00479                         event_bus_parse_message();
00480                 
00481                 if (!tx_queue_is_empty())
00482                         bus_check_tx_status();
00483                 
00484                 if (runtime_settings.band_change_mode != BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL) {
00485                         if (radio_get_current_band() != status.selected_band) {
00486                                 status.new_band_portion = BAND_LOW;
00487                                 status.current_band_portion = status.new_band_portion;
00488                                 
00489                                 status.new_band = radio_get_current_band();
00490                                 band_ctrl_change_band(status.new_band);
00491                                 
00492                                 send_ping();
00493                         }
00494                         
00495                         if (radio_interface_get_interface() != RADIO_INTERFACE_BCD) {
00496                                 if (radio_get_band_portion() != status.current_band_portion) {
00497                                         status.new_band_portion = radio_get_band_portion();
00498                                         status.current_band_portion = status.new_band_portion;
00499                                         
00500                                         band_ctrl_change_band_portion(status.new_band_portion);
00501                                 }
00502                         }
00503                 }
00504                 
00505                 //Poll the RX queue in the internal comm to see if we have any new messages to be PARSED
00506                 internal_comm_poll_rx_queue();
00507                 
00508                 //Poll the TX queue in the internal comm to see if we have any new messages to be SENT
00509                 internal_comm_poll_tx_queue();
00510 
00511                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_RUN_EVENT_QUEUE)) {
00512                         //Run the event in the queue
00513                         event_run();
00514                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_RUN_EVENT_QUEUE);
00515                 }
00516         
00517                 //Poll the buttons
00518                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_POLL_BUTTONS)) {
00519                         event_poll_buttons();
00520                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_POLL_BUTTONS);
00521                 }
00522                 
00523                 //Poll the external devices, such as footswitch, radio sense etc
00524                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_POLL_EXT_DEVICES)) {
00525                         event_poll_ext_device();
00526                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_POLL_EXT_DEVICES);
00527                 }
00528                 
00529                 //Update the display
00530                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY)) {
00531                         event_update_display();
00532                         
00533                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY);
00534                 }
00535                 
00536                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_POLL_PULSE_SENSOR)) {
00537                         int val = rotary_encoder_poll();
00538                         
00539                         if (val != 0) {
00540                                 if (val == 1)
00541                                         event_pulse_sensor_up();
00542                                 else if (val == -1)
00543                                         event_pulse_sensor_down();
00544                                 
00545                                 counter_last_pulse_event = 0;
00546                         }
00547                 }
00548                 
00549                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_BLINK_BAND_LED)) {
00550                         if (status.new_band != status.selected_band) {
00551                                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_LAST_BAND_BLINK)) {
00552                                         led_set_band_none();
00553                                         led_set_band(status.new_band);
00554                                 
00555                                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_LAST_BAND_BLINK);
00556                                 }
00557                                 else {
00558                                         led_set_band_none();
00559                                         led_set_band(status.selected_band);
00560                                 
00561                                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_LAST_BAND_BLINK);
00562                                 }
00563                         }
00564                         else if ((main_flags & (1<<FLAG_LAST_BAND_BLINK)) == 0) {
00565                                 led_set_band_none();
00566                                 led_set_band(status.selected_band);
00567                                 
00568                                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_LAST_BAND_BLINK);
00569                         }
00570                 
00571                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_BLINK_BAND_LED);
00572                 }
00573                 
00574                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_POLL_RADIO)) {
00575                         radio_poll_status();
00576                         
00577                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_POLL_RADIO);
00578                 }
00579                 
00580                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_PROCESS_RX_ANT_CHANGE)) {
00581                         antenna_ctrl_change_rx_ant(status.selected_rx_antenna);
00582                         
00583                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_CHANGE_RX_ANT);
00584                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_PROCESS_RX_ANT_CHANGE);
00585                 }
00586                 
00587                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_PROCESS_SUBMENU_CHANGE)) {
00588                         sub_menu_send_data_to_bus(status.sub_menu_antenna_index, sub_menu_get_current_pos(status.sub_menu_antenna_index));
00589                         
00590                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_CHANGE_SUBMENU);
00591                         main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_PROCESS_SUBMENU_CHANGE);
00592                 }
00593                 
00594                 if (bus_is_master()) {
00595                         if (counter_sync >= BUS_MASTER_SYNC_INTERVAL) {
00596                                 bus_add_tx_message(bus_get_address(), BUS_BROADCAST_ADDR, 0, BUS_CMD_SYNC, 1, &device_count);
00597 
00598                                 counter_sync = 0;
00599                         }
00600                 }
00601 
00602                 if (bus_allowed_to_send()) {
00603                         //Check if a ping message should be sent out on the bus
00604                         if (counter_ping_interval >= BUS_DEVICE_STATUS_MESSAGE_INTERVAL) {
00605                                 send_ping();
00606                                 printf("SEND PING, addr: 0x%02X\n",bus_get_address());
00607                                 
00608                                 counter_ping_interval = 0;
00609                         }
00610                 }
00611                 
00612                 if (settings.powermeter_address != 0x00)
00613                         powermeter_process_tasks();
00614                 
00615                 radio_process_tasks();
00616         }
00617 }
00618 
00620 ISR(SIG_OUTPUT_COMPARE0A) {
00621         //If this device should act as master it should send out a SYNC command
00622         //and also the number of devices (for the time slots) that are active on the bus
00623         if ((device_started == 1) && (bus_is_master())) {
00624                 counter_sync++;
00625         }
00626         
00627         if (radio_rx_data_counter >= RADIO_RX_DATA_TIMEOUT) {
00628                 radio_communicaton_timeout();
00629                 
00630                 radio_rx_data_counter = 0;
00631         }
00632 
00633         if (counter_poll_rotary_encoder >= INTERVAL_POLL_ROTARY_ENCODER) {
00634                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_POLL_PULSE_SENSOR);
00635                 
00636                 counter_poll_rotary_encoder = 0;
00637         }
00638 
00639         if (counter_poll_buttons == INTERVAL_POLL_BUTTONS) {
00640                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_POLL_BUTTONS);
00641         
00642                 counter_poll_buttons = 0;
00643         }
00644         
00645         if (counter_poll_ext_devices == INTERVAL_POLL_EXT_DEVICES) {
00646                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_POLL_EXT_DEVICES);
00647                 counter_poll_ext_devices = 0;
00648         }
00649         
00650         if (event_in_queue()) {
00651                 if (counter_event_timer >= (event_queue_get()).time_target)
00652                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_RUN_EVENT_QUEUE);
00653         }
00654         
00655 /*      if (!display_screensaver_mode()) {
00656                 if (counter_screensaver_timeout >= DISPLAY_SCREENSAVER_TIMEOUT) {
00657                         event_add_message((void*)display_update_screensaver, 0,0);
00658                         display_set_backlight(DISPLAY_SCREENSAVER_DEF_CONTRAST);
00659                         
00660                         counter_screensaver_timeout = 0;
00661                 }
00662         }*/
00663         
00664         counter_last_pulse_event++;
00665         counter_poll_rotary_encoder++;
00666         counter_poll_buttons++;
00667         counter_poll_ext_devices++;     
00668         counter_screensaver_timeout++;
00669         counter_ping_interval++;
00670         counter_ms++;
00671         counter_event_timer++;
00672         radio_rx_data_counter++;
00673 
00674         //This will blink the NEW BAND LED, if the new band is not the same as the old one
00675         if ((counter_ms % 250) == 0) {
00676                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_BLINK_BAND_LED);
00677         }
00678         
00679         //Update every 500 ms
00680         if ((counter_ms % 500) == 0) {
00681                 unsigned char flags = 0;
00682                 
00683                 for (int i=0;i<4;i++) {
00684                         flags |= antenna_ctrl_get_rotator_flags(i);
00685                 }
00686                 
00687                 if (flags & (1<<FLAG_NO_ROTATION))
00688                         led_set_rotation_active(LED_STATE_OFF);
00689                 else
00690                         led_set_rotation_active(LED_STATE_ON);
00691                 
00692                 if (status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE)) {
00693                         if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_LAST_ANTENNA_BLINK)) {
00694                                 main_flags &= ~(1<<FLAG_LAST_ANTENNA_BLINK);
00695                                 
00696                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<4;i++)
00697                                         if (antenna_ctrl_get_rotatable() & (1<<i))
00698                                                 led_set_tx_ant(i+1,LED_STATE_ON);
00699                         }
00700                         else {
00701                                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<4;i++)
00702                                         if (antenna_ctrl_get_rotatable() & (1<<i))
00703                                                 led_set_tx_ant(i+1,LED_STATE_OFF);
00704                                 
00705                                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_LAST_ANTENNA_BLINK);
00706                         }
00707                 }
00708         }
00709         
00710         if (counter_last_pulse_event > PULSE_SENSOR_RX_ANT_CHANGE_LIMIT) {
00711                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_CHANGE_RX_ANT))
00712                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_PROCESS_RX_ANT_CHANGE);
00713         }
00714         
00715         if (counter_last_pulse_event > PULSE_SENSOR_SUBMENU_CHANGE_LIMIT) {
00716                 if (main_flags & (1<<FLAG_CHANGE_SUBMENU))
00717                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_PROCESS_SUBMENU_CHANGE);
00718         }
00719         
00720         if (runtime_settings.band_change_mode == BAND_CHANGE_MODE_AUTO) {
00721                 if (counter_poll_radio >= (radio_interface_get_poll_interval() * 10)) {
00722                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_POLL_RADIO);
00723                         
00724                         counter_poll_radio = 0;
00725                 }
00726                         
00727                 counter_poll_radio++;
00728         }
00729         
00730         //If the value equals the half of it's range then
00731         //we remove that amount from all target times in the event
00732         //queue and set the counter to 0 again
00733         if (counter_event_timer >= 32767) {
00734                 event_queue_wrap(32767);
00735                 
00736                 counter_event_timer = 0;
00737         }
00738         
00739         internal_comm_1ms_timer();
00740         
00741         if (settings.powermeter_address != 0x00)
00742                 powermeter_1ms_tick();
00743         
00744         bus_ping_tick();
00745 }
00746 
00748 ISR(SIG_OVERFLOW0) {
00749 }
